entries.title: Factorio has sold 3.5 million copies
entries.description: Factory just keeps growing. You can't explain that.

entries.title: Cult of the Lamb's first big update will bring new attacks for every weapon
entries.description: Heavy Attacks will charge up and smash your enemies next year.

entries.title: PC Gamer Hardware Awards 2022: The best gear of year
entries.description: This is the best PC gaming hardware this year has had to offer.

entries.title: After a terrible 2021 for hardware, was 2022 really any better?
entries.description: In some ways, yes, in a lot of ways, oh hell no.

entries.title: Taking the Steam Deck to a bar was a mixed experience
entries.description: Here's what happened when I whipped my Deck out in public.

entries.title: AI art isn't going away
entries.description: Despite ethical problems, AI image generators and other machine learning applications won't be willed away.

entries.title: The year in NFT buffoonery: Rug pulls, hacks, and poor choices
entries.description: 2023 may be the year we finally learn that NFTs are a bad idea, because 2022 sure wasn't.

entries.title: Elden Ring's environment is still my gaming highlight of 2022
entries.description: Nothing was quite as special as exploring The Lands Between.

entries.title: TV showrunners and game developers have become allies at long last
entries.description: Mutual respect has been the secret sauce behind a recent slew of great adaptations.

entries.title: 2022 saw launcher bloat turn from a minor annoyance into a genuine problem
entries.description: Help, my games keep exploding on the launchpad.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 560 answer and hint for Saturday, December 31
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #560 puzzle.

entries.title: How do the Home Alone videogames hold up?
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

entries.title: Why'd nobody tell me about the heavy metal turtle racing scene in this JRPG?
entries.description: Y'all let me down. Every single one of you.
